# ondiscdata

## Installation

This package contains data for use in examples and vignettes of the `ondisc` package. All datasets are single-cell datasets, stored in HDF5 (.h5), matrix market (.mtx), or ondisc (.odm) format.

Install the package from Github via the following command:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Katsevich-Lab/ondiscdata")
```
